column4: Can someone help me with this? (EE) Failed to load module "nvidia" (module-specific error, 0)
I have all of the nvidia-common/current/etc. pacakges installed
how'd you install your nvidia drivers?
do you ahve an nvidia card?
apt-get --reinstall install  nvidia-current nvidia-current-dev nvclock-gtk  nvidia-settings
do you have a card that is supported by nvidia-current?
Kernel 2.6.38 works and loads this driver, but not 2.6.32-42-preempt
you need the kernel module for 2.6.32  kernel then
Correct, and that's what the above packages build and provide for me
